preferencesteps: Write debugging information into system log
preferencelist.name: debug_logging

preferencesteps: Allow automatic sending of crash reports
preferencelist.name: crashreport_enabled

preferencesteps: Write local changes immediately to backend
preferencelist.name: sync_changes_immediately

preferencesteps: Allow communication with https even when certificate is issued to different host. WARNING: this is insecure, only use on private network and at your own risk. This setting is taken into account when you setup a WebDAV backend. Changing it does not affect existing backends.
preferencelist.name: webdav_allow_unverified_host

preferencesteps: Use this alternative method if there is no file manager installed on the device.
preferencelist.name: restore_legacy

preferencesteps: User email to be included in crash report
preferencelist.name: crashreport_useremail

preferencesteps: Upon app start, scroll transaction list to current date
preferencelist.name: scroll_to_current_date

preferencesteps: Upon short tap on entry in template list
preferencelist.name: template_click_default

preferencesteps: Allow to set exact transaction time.
preferencelist.name: transaction_time

preferencesteps: Data entry from widgets and shortcuts
preferencelist.name: enable_data_entry_from_widget

preferencesteps: Select a backup for restoring database and preferences.
preferencelist.name: restore

preferencesteps: Enable fast scroll for account list. May lead to incorrect display on some devices
preferencelist.name: account_list_fast_scroll

preferencesteps: Backup database daily at the specified time (only if data has changed).
preferencelist.name: auto_backup_info

preferencesteps: Allow to set value date in addition to booking date. Transaction time will be hidden. This setting is not applied to cash accounts.
preferencelist.name: value_date
